about_the_game:
Lobo is an enthralling action-adventure game set in a semi-open world, where freedom and exploration reign within the boundaries of a compelling narrative. The majority of your journey unfolds in vibrant, sprawling forests, providing a rich backdrop for your adventures. Yet, the game also offers a taste of classic RPG exploration with captivating dungeons that take the form of mines, caves, and enigmatic labyrinths.

Drawing inspiration from games like The Last of Us and Diablo, Lobo also weaves a tapestry of nostalgia by reaching into our cherished childhood memories. It channels the spirit of classic films and stories like Star Wars, The Neverending Story, Back to the Future, and Teen Wolf, infusing the game with a unique blend of modern action and timeless magic.



You step into the shoes of Harley, a teenager marked by a tragic fate. His life took a dark turn when a werewolf's deadly attack claimed his mother. Raised by his grandparents in the heart of the forest, they shielded him from the human world's harsh realities. However, fate's cruel hand forces him to leave his cherished home when ominous creatures assault his Grandmother.

A slim chance to bring her back from the realm of the dead will embark Harley on an epic quest, unearthing the dormant powers hidden within himself and the harsh truths of the world that will reshape his very being. It's a story that delves deep, weaving unexpected twists and imparting valuable life lessons. It's a tale of personal and societal acceptance, an ode to nature, and a plea for a better world.

The stage for this narrative is a world steeped in rich and intricate lore, a realm of fantasy that merges the medieval with the modern. It's a world in turmoil, where humans and lycanthropes clash in a battle for territory and its treasures. Yet, as the game unfolds, darker secrets buried deep within the world's fabric will come to light. Along your journey, you'll explore this vivid world, encounter diverse races, and confront enigmatic creatures that call it home.



Lobo's combat system is a distinctive feature, a dynamic fusion of weaponry and abilities working in perfect harmony.

In Lobo, each weapon is the key to unlocking our core skills - Rogue, Warrior, Berserker, and Gunner. What sets this apart is the freedom to wield them all simultaneously. With the right equipment, you can have up to four different weapons at your disposal, choosing the one that suits the situation best.

Rogue grants agility, enabling swift strikes and covert takedowns. Warrior embraces might, delivering devastating blows while offering the defense to parry and counter foes. Berserker unleashes ferocity, allowing brutal assaults at the cost of stamina. Gunner, on the other hand, equips you for ranged warfare with firearms.

Furthermore, as you progress, your combat prowess can evolve through leveling up and by discovering or acquiring superior weaponry. The world invites exploration, promising valuable rewards for your efforts.



The game's visuals are of paramount importance, stemming from a captivating blend of eras and cultures. It dances between the modern and medieval, seamlessly weaving Western and Oriental influences. The inspiration behind this artistry traces back to the brilliance of legendary creators like Akira Toriyama and contemporary artists such as Hicham Habchi, infused with my unique personal touch and design.

The world and its inhabitants are born from a meticulously crafted lore, each detail carefully nurtured and developed. In a unique twist that infuses deep personal meaning, every character and NPC relevant to the story finds its foundation in real-life figures who hold a significant place in my heart—my family and friends.

Lobo is a captivating action-adventure game set in a semi-open world, offering the freedom to roam and explore within the narrative's bounds. Most of the game unfolds on the surface, predominantly within lush forests. However, classic RPG-style dungeons await your exploration, taking on the forms of mines, caves, and shadowy dungeons.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 (4 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909 or Newer)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Explore a World suspended between Medieval and Modern. A captivating narrative where humans clash with werewolves. In this single-player action-adventure you will master Rogue, Warrior, Berserker, & Gunner skills all at once.

English*, Spanish - Spain
